tool_description: This API will bring a JSON file with the price of items from local stores that has the online store feature available such Tesco.ie
name: API-Shopping
title: API-Shopping

api_list.name: Get prices of tomatoes
api_list.description: This one will get prices from tomatoes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://api-shopping.p.rapidapi.com/shopping?item=tomatoes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "api-shopping.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get prices of bananas
api_list.description: On this option, you can get a JSON file with the prices of bananas from TESCO

headers = {

print(response.json())
